channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump to address affordability. And, the significance of Indiana's redistricting fight

item.title: Gov. Pritzker Signs Bill Imposing New Limits on Immigration Enforcement in Illinois
item.description: The measure restricts immigration arrests around state courthouses. Republicans have criticized the law and suggested it would face legal challenges.

item.title: Believe it or not, this book makes taxes fascinating

item.title: Kathryn Garcia Expected to Be Named New Head of the Port Authority
item.description: Ms. Garcia, who ran for mayor of New York in 2021 after serving as the city’s sanitation commissioner, would succeed Rick Cotton, who is retiring.

item.title: Rising temperatures could have a chilling impact on young children
item.description: A study points to a new concern about the effect that heat can have on young children.

item.title: Injuries Reported in Shooting at Kentucky State University, Officials Say
item.description: The police said a suspect had been arrested after the shooting at the school in Frankfort, Ky.

item.title: Trump and Europe’s Far Right
item.description: The American national security strategy echoes the language of far-right parties. But hardliners across the Atlantic seem unimpressed.

item.title: Australia’s Social Media Ban for People Under 16 Takes Effect
item.description: The measure is one of the most sweeping efforts in the world to safeguard children from the harms of the platforms.
